product.productPitch: Adventure without limits. This performance hiker is not only waterproof but also features an ultra-grippy outsole for exceptional traction on wet or dry trails.

seo.title: Men's Peakfreak™ II OutDry™ Shoe
seo.description: This waterproof hiking shoe features an ultra-grippy outsole for traction on wet or dry trails.

attributes.label: Product Pitch
value: Adventure without limits. This performance hiker is not only waterproof but also features an ultra-grippy outsole for exceptional traction on wet or dry trails.

options.description: OutDry™ is absolutely waterproof yet breathable. The bonded construction leaves no space between the membrane and outer shell for water to get in while helping you stay drier, lighter, and more comfortable.
options.name: OutDry

options.description: Our most advanced lightweight cushioning for comfortable performance on and off the trail.
options.name: Techlite+™

options.description: Lock your heel in place for greater comfort and stability when running or hiking.
options.name: Navic Fit™

options.description: Advanced traction system for both wet and dry trail conditions.
options.name: Adapt Trax™

price.html: Regular price: $130.00

product.attributesHtml:
Attributes

Product Copy Attributes

  • Product Pitch: Adventure without limits. This performance hiker is not only waterproof but also features an ultra-grippy outsole for exceptional traction on wet or dry trails.

Presentation Attributes

  • Size & Fit Assets: Mens-Footwear

Product Features

  • Activity: Hiking
  • Technology: OutDry Techlite+ NavicFit AdaptTrax
  • Corporate Initiative: HERproject

Hierarchy Attributes

  • Big & Tall: Standard

Compare Attributes
